text: Kim Donaldson (born August 24, 1983) is a Canadian rugby union player. She represented at the 2010 and 2014 Women's Rugby World Cup. Donaldson has a Bachelor's degree in Anthropology from the University of British Columbia. ==References== ==External links== * Player profile at Rugby Canada Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian female rugby union players Category:University of British Columbia alumni
title: Kim Donaldson (rugby union)
